properties.title: Skills Park Hexenland
properties.abstract: In the Skills Park Hexenland on the Belalp, you will pick up all the important technical riding ingredients for having fun on the trails. The realm of the Belalp witch Vero includes several short trails featuring obstacles such as the Rock Garden, table jumps, approach curves, drops and much more. You can quickly get back to the start with the specially designed uphill trail.
properties.description:
Opening period: June to October

Type of terrain: natural

Total length of trail: 940m
properties.name: Blatten-Belalp Tourismus AG
